feed.title: Last Mountain Lake (Sanctuary) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Last Mountain Lake (Sanctuary)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Last Mountain 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -28.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -31.9°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 60%
